00023   SP38Optimisator::SP38Optimisator(ScenarioReader* sr,string host,int spe, double discount, double step_size,bool fapc, bool f,bool d,bool n, int maxt, bool id)
00024     : steps_per_epoch(spe), run_forever(f), debug(d), noisy(n)
00025   {
00026     // Setting up the simulator
00027     SP38PGSimulator* sim = new SP38PGSimulator(sr,DEFAULT_SIM_STEP_SIZE,host,RT_LocalReward,fapc,run_forever,debug,noisy,maxt,id);
00028     simulator = sim;
00029     scenario = sim->getScenario();
00030 
00031     // Setting up controllers
00032     FactoredController::Controllers controllers;    
00033     for(IntersectionSet::iterator i = scenario->intersections.begin(); i != scenario->intersections.end(); i++){
00034       char disc[100];
00035       sprintf(disc," %f",discount);
00036       controllers.push_back(getController (*i, SP38_CVV_NAC_CONTROLLER + string(disc)));
00037     }
00038     // Creating the factored controller
00039     FactoredController* controller = new FactoredController(controllers, true, true);    
00040     learner = new OLPomdp(controller, simulator, discount, step_size);
00041   }

00049   SP38Optimisator::SP38Optimisator(string cf) {
00050     try{
00051       ConfigFile config( cf );
00052       // Loading variables
00053       debug = config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_DEBUG);
00054       noisy = config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_NOISY);
00055       run_forever = config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_RUN_FOREVER);
00056       steps_per_epoch = config.read<int> ( SP38_CVN_EPOCH_SIZE );
00057       
00058       if(noisy) cout << "Load configuration from " << cf << endl;
00059      
00060       if( config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_PRINT_CONFIGURATION) ){
00061         cout << config << endl;
00062       }
00063  
00064       if(noisy) cout << "-- Getting scenario " << endl;
00065       ScenarioReader* sr = getScenarioReader( config.read<string>(SP38_CVN_INSTANCE_FORMAT),
00066                                               config.read<string>(SP38_CVN_INSTANCE_PATH));
00067       if(noisy) cout << "-- Getting simulator " << endl;    
00068       SP38PGSimulator* sim = new SP38PGSimulator(sr,
00069                                                  config.read<int>(SP38_CVN_TIME_STEP_DURATION),
00070                                                  config.read<string>(SP38_CVN_SERVER_HOST),
00071                                                  getRewardType(config.read<string>(SP38_CVN_REWARD_TYPE)),
00072                                                  config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_ALL_PHASES_IN_CYCLE),
00073                                                  run_forever,
00074                                                  debug,
00075                                                  noisy,
00076                                                  config.read<int>(SP38_CVN_MAX_CONNECT_TRIES),
00077                                                  config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_DEBUG_SP38_PROTOCOL));
00078 
00079       if(noisy) cout << "-- Setting features " << endl;    
00080       sim->setUsingConstantFeature(config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_CONSTANT_FEATURE));
00081       sim->setUsingCurrentPhaseFeature(config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_CUR_PHASE_FEATURE));
00082       sim->setUsingPhaseDurationFeature(config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_PHASE_DUR_FEATURE));
00083       sim->setUsingCycleDurationFeature(config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_CYCLE_DUR_FEATURE));
00084       sim->setUsingAllPhasesDurationFeature(config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_ALL_PHASES_DUR_FEATURE)) ;
00085       sim->setUsingDetectorActiveFeature(config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_DETECTOR_ACTIV_FEATURE));
00086       sim->setUsingPhasesHistoryFeature(config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_PHASES_HISTORY_FEATURE));
00087       sim->setUsingIgnoredFeature(config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_IGNORED_FEATURE));
00088       sim->setUsingDayHourFeature(config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_DAY_HOUR_FEATURE));
00089       
00090       simulator = sim;
00091       scenario = sim->getScenario();
00092       scenario->setCycleDuration( config.read<int>(SP38_CVN_CYCLE_DURATION) );
00093       // Setting up controllers
00094       if(noisy) cout << "-- Getting controllers" << endl;
00095       FactoredController::Controllers controllers;    
00096       for(IntersectionSet::iterator i = scenario->intersections.begin(); i != scenario->intersections.end(); i++){
00097         controllers.push_back(getController(*i, config.read<string>(SP38_CVN_INTERSECTION_PREFIX + 
00098                                                                     (*i)->getId() +  
00099                                                                     SP38_CVN_CONTROLLER_SUFIX)));
00100       }
00101 
00102       // Setting up intersections times
00103       for(IntersectionSet::iterator i = scenario->intersections.begin(); i != scenario->intersections.end(); i++){
00104         setIntersectionTimes(*i, config.read<string>(SP38_CVN_INTERSECTION_PREFIX + 
00105                                                      (*i)->getId() +  
00106                                                      SP38_CVN_CONFIGURATION_SUFIX));
00107       }
00108       
00109 
00110       
00111       // Creating the factored controller
00112       FactoredController* controller = new FactoredController(controllers, true, true);    
00113       learner = new OLPomdp(controller, simulator, 
00114                             config.read<double> ( SP38_CVN_LEARNER_DISCOUNT ), 
00115                             config.read<double> ( SP38_CVN_LEARNER_STEP_SIZE ) );    
00116       
00117       learner->setUseAutoBaseline( config.read<bool>(SP38_CVN_AUTO_BASE_LINE) );
00118       
00119       saveBestParameters( config.read<string> ( SP38_CVN_SAVE_PARAMETERS ) );
00120       loadParameters( config.read<string> (  SP38_CVN_PARAMETERS ) );    
00121     } catch (ConfigFile::key_not_found knf) { 
00122       cout << "Key " << knf.key << " not found in config file " << endl;
00123       exit(-1);
00124     } catch (ConfigFile::file_not_found fnf) {
00125       cout << "Configuration file " << fnf.filename << " not found " << endl;
00126       exit(-1);
00127     }
00128   }

00134   RewardType SP38Optimisator::getRewardType(string reward_name){
00135     
00136     if ( reward_name == SP38_CVV_REWARD_LOCAL )
00137       return RT_LocalReward;    
00138 
00139     if ( reward_name == SP38_CVV_REWARD_POWER )
00140       return RT_PowerLocalReward;    
00141 
00142     if ( reward_name == SP38_CVV_REWARD_MIXED )
00143       return RT_MixedReward;   
00144 
00145     cout << "REWARD TYPE " << reward_name << " NOT RECOGNIZED" << endl;
00146     exit(-1);
00147 
00148   }

00156   ScenarioReader* SP38Optimisator::getScenarioReader(string format,string path){
00157     
00158     if( format == SP38_CVV_INST_FORMAT_PARAMICS )
00159       return new ParamicsScenarioReader(path);    
00160 
00161     if( format == SP38_CVV_INST_FORMAT_ARTEMIS )
00162       return new ArtemisScenarioReader(path);    
00163     
00164     if( format == SP38_CVV_INST_FORMAT_RTA1 )
00165       return new ParamicsRtaSampleOneReader();
00166 
00167     cout << "FILE FORMAT " << format << " NOT RECOGNIZED" << endl;
00168     exit(-1);
00169   }

00175   void SP38Optimisator::setIntersectionTimes(Intersection* i, string conf){
00176 
00177     // Setting up tokenizer
00178     typedef boost::tokenizer<boost::char_separator<char> >  tokenizer;
00179     boost::char_separator<char> sep(" ");
00180 
00181     tokenizer tokens(conf, sep);
00182     std::vector <string> vec_tokens;
00183     for (tokenizer::iterator tok_iter = tokens.begin(); tok_iter != tokens.end(); ++tok_iter) vec_tokens.push_back(*tok_iter);
00184     int tot_tokens = vec_tokens.size();
00185 
00186     if(tot_tokens < 3){
00187       cout << "Wrong format for `" << SP38_CVN_INTERSECTION_PREFIX + i->getId() + SP38_CVN_CONFIGURATION_SUFIX << "' key in config file" << endl;
00188       exit(-1);
00189     }
00190     
00191     i->setYellowDuration(atoi(vec_tokens[0].c_str()));
00192     i->setInterGreenInterval(atoi(vec_tokens[1].c_str()));
00193     i->setMinimumGreenDuration(atoi(vec_tokens[2].c_str()));
00194 
00195   }
00196     
00201   libpg::Controller* SP38Optimisator::getController(Intersection* intersection, string desc){
00202     
00203     // Setting up tokenizer
00204     typedef boost::tokenizer<boost::char_separator<char> >  tokenizer;
00205     boost::char_separator<char> sep(" ");
00206 
00207     tokenizer tokens(desc, sep);
00208     std::vector <string> vec_tokens;
00209     for (tokenizer::iterator tok_iter = tokens.begin(); tok_iter != tokens.end(); ++tok_iter) vec_tokens.push_back(*tok_iter);
00210     int tot_tokens = vec_tokens.size();
00211 
00212     if(tot_tokens == 0){
00213       cout << "There is no `" << SP38_CVN_INTERSECTION_PREFIX + intersection->getId() + SP38_CVN_CONTROLLER_SUFIX << "' key in config file" << endl;
00214       exit(-1);
00215     }
00216     
00217     // Processing
00218     // Tokens[0] should inform the type of controller
00219     if( vec_tokens[0] == SP38_CVV_OLPOMDP_CONTROLLER ){
00220       // If OLPomdp no parameters
00221       if(noisy)
00222         cout << "Creating OLPomdp Controller for intersection " << intersection->getId() << endl;
00223       return new BasicController (new NeuralNetBatch(simulator->getObsRows(), intersection->getTotalPhases()));
00224     }
00225 
00226     if( vec_tokens[0] == SP38_CVV_NAC_CONTROLLER ){
00227       // If NAC, tokens[1] informs the discount
00228       if(noisy)
00229         cout << "Creating NAC Controller for intersection " << intersection->getId() << endl;
00230       return new NACTransform( new BasicController (new NeuralNetBatch(simulator->getObsRows(), intersection->getTotalPhases())), atof( vec_tokens[1].c_str() ));
00231     }
00232     
00233     if( vec_tokens[0] == SP38_CVV_FIXED_CONTROLLER ){
00234 
00235       if(noisy)
00236         cout << "Creating Fixed Controller for intersection " << intersection->getId() << " with " << intersection->phases.size() << " phases" << endl;      
00237       // if Fixed Controller, we have a variable number of tokens
00238       // tokens 1 to size-1 informs phases durations
00239       if(tot_tokens-2 != (int)intersection->phases.size()){
00240         cout << "There are parameters missing for fixed controller definition." << endl;
00241         cout << "Tokens " << tot_tokens-2 << endl;
00242         exit(-1);
00243       }
00244       int offset = atoi(vec_tokens[1].c_str());
00245       std::vector <int> phases_length;
00246       for(int i=2;i<tot_tokens;i++)
00247         phases_length.push_back( atoi(vec_tokens[i].c_str()));
00248       return new FixedController(intersection,simulator->getSP38Simulation(),offset,phases_length.size(), phases_length);
00249     }
00250 
00251     if( vec_tokens[0] == SP38_CVV_DYNAMIC_CONTROLLER ){
00252       if(noisy)
00253         cout << "Creating Dynamic Controller for intersection " << intersection->getId() << endl;      
00254       // For the dynamica controller we have the threshold, the threshold seconds and base seconds
00255       if(tot_tokens-1 < 1){
00256         cout << "The cycle size parameter is missing for dynamic controller definition." << endl;
00257         exit(-1);
00258       }
00259       int cycle_size = atoi(vec_tokens[1].c_str());
00260       return new SimpleDynamicController(intersection,simulator->getSP38Simulation(),cycle_size);
00261     }
00262 
00263     cout << "Controller " << desc << " NOT RECOGNIZED" << endl;
00264     exit(-1);
00265         
00266   }

00272   void SP38Optimisator::run(){
00273     learner->learn(steps_per_epoch);    
00274   }

00283   void SP38Optimisator::saveBestParameters(string file){
00284     if(file!="")
00285       learner->saveBest((char*)file.c_str());
00286   }

00292   void SP38Optimisator::loadParameters(string file){
00293     if(file!="")
00294       learner->read((char*)file.c_str());
00295   }
